description: Master the fundamentals of JavaScript programming including variables, loops, functions, and basic DOM manipulation. Perfect for beginners looking to start their coding journey.
Learn how to build interactive web applications using React. Covering components, state management, props, and basic hooks, this course will help beginners create dynamic, responsive websites.
A comprehensive crash course on HTML and CSS to design and style web pages. Learn about semantic tags, layouts, flexbox, grid, colors, and typography to build visually appealing websites.
Fun and easy introduction to Python programming for kids. Learn about variables, loops, functions, and simple projects that make coding enjoyable and interactive for young learners.
Step into the world of game development using Unity. Learn the basics of creating games, character movement, simple animations, and interactive gameplay mechanics in a beginner-friendly environment.
Introduce kids to programming concepts using Scratch. Learn to create interactive stories, games, and animations while understanding loops, conditions, and events in a visual coding environment.
